summary: An email from July 10, 2019, discussing the potential need for C20 (likely a law enforcement unit) to execute another search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence for digital media and computer equipment. The email requests assistance as most of the unit is in Florida interviewing victims.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email discusses executing a search warrant at his Manhattan residence for digital media and computer equipment.

persons.name: SSA
persons.context: CC'ed on the email requesting assistance for the search warrant execution; appears to be a supervisory special agent.

events.title: Potential search warrant execution at Epstein's Manhattan residence
events.description: C20 may need to execute another search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's residence in Manhattan for digital media and computer equipment.

keyFacts: Law enforcement was planning to execute another search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence on July 11, 2019.
The search was specifically targeted at digital media and computer equipment.
Most of the C20 unit was in Florida interviewing victims at the time, indicating an active victim interview phase of the investigation.
The email demonstrates ongoing investigative activity regarding Epstein in July 2019, shortly before his arrest.
